snippet: Louis V. Gerstner III, the son of the former chief executive of International Business Machines, served as president of the Gerstner Family Foundation.
abstract: Louis V. Gerstner III, the son of the former chief executive of International Business Machines, served as president of the Gerstner Family Foundation.

headline.main: Louis Gerstner III, Son of Ex-I.B.M. Chief, Dies at 41
